lead_paragraph: Roberta Cohen and Carl Gershman, human rights and democracy advocates, write that we should not “allow North Korea to use the inaccuracies recently discovered” in his testimony.
snippet: Roberta Cohen and Carl Gershman, human rights and democracy advocates, write that we should not “allow North Korea to use the inaccuracies recently discovered” in his testimony.

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
